message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $130 for it.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $100 is a fair price. Can you meet me at $100?
I'm getting close to your price, but I still need a bit more to make it worth my while. How about $125?
I'm really close to walking away, but I still want the product. Can you meet me at $110?
I'm not quite there yet, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $115?
I'm getting a bit frustrated, but I still want the product. I'm willing to meet you at $112. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I think we're getting close to a deal. How about $113?
